parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Display a resource defined in RscTitles. Also see [[cutRsc]], with these two commands you can show two different resources at once.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[titleRsc]] [text, type, speed, showInMap]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [text, type, speed]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> text: [[String]] - the class name of the resource. ("Default" will remove the current resource.)

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> type: [[String]] one of "PLAIN", "PLAIN DOWN", "BLACK", "BLACK FADED", "BLACK OUT", "BLACK IN", "WHITE OUT" and "WHITE IN". See [[Title Effect Type]]s for more information about these values.

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> speed: [[Number]] - (Optional, default -1) time in seconds to fade in resource

</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> showInMap: [[Boolean]] - (Optional, default [[true]]) [[false]] to hide the text when the map is opened.

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[titleRsc]] ["BIS", "PLAIN"]</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[titleText]], [[titleObj]], [[cutRsc]], [[allActiveTitleEffects]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on 30 Jun, 2008</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Dr_Eyeball|Dr_Eyeball]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
Using [[titleRsc]] (unlike [[cutRsc]]) for a HUD will mean:
* the HUD will remain visible when you access the map and overlay it.
* using the 'Direct communication' chat channel messages will interfere with the HUD by hiding it, since it appears to use the same 'resource layer'.

<dd class="notedate">Posted on September 25, 2014 - 10:04 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Kenoxite|Kenoxite]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
In OFP/CWA any ''<x>''Rsc will hide all the elements of the HUD, including the map.
</dd>

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
